title: 关于skript脚本插件lore的应用
author: 梅子酒呀
txt_content: 如何做到检测手持物品的某一lore，然后将这条lore替换成一条自己设置的lore。

replies.author: asdf1234
replies.txt_content:
on right click:
        if lore of player's tool contains "你的lore":
                set {_Lore::*} to lore of player's tool split at "||"
                loop {_Lore::*}:
                        if {_Lore::%loop-index%} contains "某條lore":
                                set {_line} to loop-index parsed as number    #解析為該行行數
                                set line {_line} of lore of player's tool to "你要轉換的lore"

replies.author: Cz!$KY
replies.txt_content:
这是我很久之前写的关于物品属性脚本的判断方式，你可以参考一下 ^function ai_lore_damage(t: text) :: number:
        set {_lore::*} to {_t} split by "||"
        loop {_lore::*}:
                if "%loop-value%" contains "%{AXIONITEM::LORESETTING::DAMAGE::KEY}%":
                        set {_triggerline} to "%loop-value%"
                        set {_extradamage} to regex replace "[^0-9(\.\)]*" with "" in {_triggerline} parsed as number
                        broadcast {_extradamage}
                        return {_extradamage} / 2
